title: Pet Friendly Community - Renovations In Progress!
posting_body: ['We are pet friendly', 'Welcome Home to Gateway Villas', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Gateway Villas', '3200 McLeod Drive, Las Vegas, NV, 89121', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 867 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to Gateway Villas in Las Vegas, NV.', 'Offering 1 to 2 bedroom apartment options, your new home is waiting.', 'Here at this community, the leasing staff is ready to help you find the perfect place.', "You'll experience a variety of features and amenities at this community including washers and dryers and convenient on-site parking options.", 'Come see Gateway Villas today.', 'Features', '- Walk-in closet', '- Central A/C', '- Full-size washer and dryer inside', '- Patio with storage', '- Ceramic tile floors', '- Water, sewer,', 'trash included', 'Community Amenities', '- Fitness Center', '- Pool', '- Centrally Located', '- Online Rent Payments', '- Assigned Covered Parking', '- Putting Greens', '- Grill', '- Spa', '- Next Door To Public Park', 'Pet Policy', 'We welcome your cats and dogs, up to two pets per apartment, with no weight limit.', 'Non-Refundable Pet Fee $250 and $25 a month per pet.', '*Breed restrictions apply.', 'We do not permit American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, German Shepard, Doberman, Rottweiler, Akitas, and Mastiffs any mix of the previous breeds, or any other dog or breed deemed aggressive.', 'Income Requirements:', '3x the Rent', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 8:30AM-5:30PM', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'TKmBGtq7k']
